samples.context: Centrosome is present in animal cells and in certain lower plants. It is absent in prokaryotic cells and in higher plant cells. It is located near one pole of the nucleus.
samples.question: What cells contain centrosomes?

samples.context: It contains a pair of small, hollow granules called centrioles. Centrosome is present in animal cells and in certain lower plants.
samples.question: What structures are found in centrosomes?

samples.context: It is located near one pole of the nucleus. It contains a pair of small, hollow granules called centrioles.
